tweet: Good news for #NorthDakota farmers: EU today approved using U.S. soybeans for biofuels in Europe till 2021. This decision will help boost U.S. soybean exports. More here: https://www.apnews.com/26c89baaa5604e9cb5baa6c00e0490ef …

I led a delegation letter to DOT Sec. Elaine Chao urging expedited environmental review for bridge to cross Little Missouri R. in Billings Co - bridge would greatly aid first responders who currently have to drive through river or 70 miles around to respond to emergencies.
Reminder to all #NorthDakota #farmers & #ranchers: @USDA has extended the deadline to apply for the Market Facilitation Program to Feb. 14. pic.twitter.com/jc88YhFcvv

Estate planning & ensuring the future operations of a farm or small business are difficult enough, & the death tax only makes these decisions more challenging. I helped reintroduce legislation today to repeal this tax. http://bit.ly/2To4npi

Today our nation remembers Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. We honor his life & legacy as a civil rights leader.

The president outlined a compromise proposal to strengthen border security & end the partial government shutdown. Read my statement here: https://www.hoeven.senate.gov/news/news-releases/hoeven-statement-on-presidents-plan-to-strengthen-border-security-reopen-government …
Great to see students from around #NorthDakota in D.C. for #MarchForLife today. We appreciate & support your efforts in advocating for the right to life. pic.twitter.com/i8Mk0Kecf4

Every year, hundreds of thousands of people come to our nation’s capital to #MarchForLife, including many from #NorthDakota. I met w/ students from #Fargo Shanley HS & #Minot’s Bishop Ryan HS to outline the importance of today’s event & wish them well. #WhyWeMarch pic.twitter.com/owIBeg7UQN

Spoke w/ @StuartVarney today about our efforts to fund both border security & remaining 25 percent of government, as well as legislation I’m cosponsoring w/ @SenRonJohnson that would ensure that federal employees working during the partial shutdown receive their pay. ↓ pic.twitter.com/MDCMcOmAdK

BIG NEWS: @SecElaineChao announced that @FAANews has selected Northern Plains #UAS Test Site in #NorthDakota to serve in its UTM pilot program, which will work to integrate small UAS into our national airspace at lower altitudes.

I spoke w/ OMB to urge inclusion of Red River Valley’s #floodprotection project in POTUS’ FY2020 budget. This project is vital to the safety & well-being of the region’s residents & we’re also working to set up meetings between OMB & local leaders. More: http://bit.ly/2RqJPiQ

I joined #NorthDakota #VFW in #Bismarck to outline our work to improve health care & benefits for #vets in ND & across the nation, including improving access to alternative treatments for those suffering from PTSD & traumatic brain injury.
